data.title: University of Bristol
data.meta_description: Do you want to know if University of Bristol is a good uni? Read our reviews written by students for students to find out.

Course rating (4)

Hi, I'm PhD l student, and I have many classes that run continuously throughout the entire day. This schedule is quite exhausting for me. Moreover, I find it challenging to maintain my concentration for such long periods, which I feel detracts from the overall learning experience.

University halls (3)

zinc quarter townhouse

I'm staying in Zinc Quarter, and it's pretty far from campus, so getting around isn't all that easy. Plus, there's often a lot of loud talking going on around here, which really messes with my sleep. And about the rent – it feels a bit steep, you know? I mean, the place is alright, but it doesn't really live up to what I'm paying.

Course rating (3)

- the unit coordinators are great but as we do seminars, we get different tutors and phd students who greatly vary in their teaching and thus affects the teaching quality that different students get. This would be what I’m most dissatisfied abt the school - the tutor contact time is also quite horrible in that tutors are only available around once a week which means sometimes I’ll have to wait 1 to 2 weeks to go through anything

Campbell House

- it is quite a shame that some students in my accommodation get very big kitchens while some, like me, get very cramped kitchens despite the fact we all pay the same price - the facilities are great - the property management is mediocre

Course rating (4)

The contact hours with lecturers and tutors are very reasonable. I enjoy my criminal, contract, and tort modules but I feel it is necessary for the Law in Action module to stretch for the entire year. I heard that it used to be an intense 2-month course instead of an entire year, and I would personally prefer having the former.

University halls (5)

Campbell House

Campbell House is a very pretty student accommodation. It is very new, and the facilities are amazing. I love the gym and study spaces in Campbell. One thing I would prefer to have is a bigger room. My room is very small compared to my friend's rooms in other uni halls.
